ComicInfo.Series: Robert Jordan's The Wheel of Time: New Spring
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Great Coalition, an army formed of the warriors from the countries of the West have fought the Aiel Hordes for three days since they crossed the Spine of the World from the Aiel Waste and are exhausted. The massed Aiel keep coming and begin to close on Tar Valon the home of the Aes Sedai; female wielders of the One Power whose influence affects all the nations of the world. Meanwhile, within Tar Valon a Fortelling of great importance and yet potential doom is overheard by two young Accepted. The Dragon has been reborn!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/wheel-of-time-new-spring-1-untitled/4000-121818/
